text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Payment of Wages (Amendment) (Tips 

and Gratuities) Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.

title: Wages (Amendment) (Tips and Gratuities) Act 2022 (No. 23 of 2022) hereby
heading: 2. The 27th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 27th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Payment of Wages (Amendment) (Tips and Gratuities) Act 2022 (No. 23 of 
2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 October, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [543] 3

title: Wages (Amendment) (Tips and Gratuities) Act 2022 (No. 23 of 2022) hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order provides that the 27th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day 
on which the Payment of Wages (Amendment) (Tips and Gratuities) Act 2022 
(No. 23 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [543]
